hero.text: Here to listen, to help you bring your projects to fruition. No matter how complex!

skills.techText: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React... Able to adapt the technology to your needs
skills.fastText: Can work on an existing project or one that has to be created from scratch
skills.richText: Having worked on a wide range of projects, I'm in a position to meet your expectations.
skills.optiText: Always following the latest in design and technology, give your projects a new lease of life
skills.plugText: We'll be in touch throughout the process. You'll be in control of what the final product will look like!
skills.apiText: Once your project is complete, you'll have a turnkey solution!

hero.title: Contact
hero.text: Contact me and I'll get back to you as soon as possible !
